sense.def:
Pomoč ali nasvet, ki je
valuable
, je zelo koristen.

seg.quote: They could also give valuable help.

sense.def:
Predmeti, ki so
valuable
, na primer slike ali nakit, so vredni veliko denarja.

seg.quote: She collected vintage cars and built up a valuable stamp collection.
They were robbed of money and valuables at gunpoint.
